bibl.title: Letter from Howard Butcher, Jr., to Howard A. Kelly, August 22, 1907

div1.p: Butcher sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Howard Butcher, Jr., to Howard A. Kelly, August 22, 1907
div1.opener:
ISAAC W. ANDERSON
JAMES MAURAN RHODES, JR.
MEMBER FRILA, STOCK EXCHANGE
N. DEAN SINKLER
HOWARD BUTCHER, JR.
RHODES, SINKLER & BUTCHER
432 SANSOM STREET
PHILADELPHIA
TELEPHONE
LOMBARD 5-00
August 22nd, 1907.
Dr. Howard A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
Baltimore, Md.
> Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
In accordance with instructions from Dr. W. W. Keen, I
enclose herewith check to your order for $5.00; also, a letter
from Dr. Keen which will explain the check.
div1.closer:
Yours truly, Howard Butcher Jr
pent WG AWC-R.
Encs.
